channel.title: Error with java/compiler ~ help!
channel.description:
:confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:
I try to compile my server, and this happens everytime:
[code]---------------------------------------- ---Compiling Server... Please wait...--- ---------------------------------------- javac: file not found: *.java Useage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options ------------------------------------------ --Server Has Successfully Been Compiled!-- ------------------------------------------ Press any key to continue . . . _[/code]
I have JDK and java and all that and my variables set all right, but I don't get it!
Please help, someone!
:confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2007, 12:13:38 AM[/size][hr]And when you reply, can you explain, please? Don't just tell me what's wrong, explain howo to fix it too :) Thank you!

item.title: Error with java/compiler ~ help!
item.dc:creator: @Lucas_Shocked Lucas[Shocked]
item.description:
@Lucas_Shocked wrote:

I try to compile my server, and this happens everytime:

[code]----------------------------------------
—Compiling Server… Please wait…—

javac: file not found: *.java
Useage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options

–Server Has Successfully Been Compiled!–

Press any key to continue . . . _[/code]

I have JDK and java and all that and my variables set all right, but I don’t get it!

Please help, someone!


[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2007, 12:13:38 AM[/size][hr]And when you reply, can you explain, please? Don’t just tell me what’s wrong, explain howo to fix it too Thank you!
